data.actual_result: It is in two lines even though there is plenty of space
data.expected_result: It should be in one line
data.short_description: In Channel Settings, Permissions, Add a Member, sometimes selecting a member causes the channel name to be pushed to the next line, even though there is plenty of room
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Channel Settings - Go to Permissions - Click Add a Member - Click a member - Observe the channel name in the top right
